title: Stredium Drops
body:
# Authors 
@juan

# Summary
Stredium is working closely with Sports Clubs, Brands and a wide range of other partners to create collections of limited edition that will be available on  OpenSea (Ethereum, Flow, Zilliqa and Matic blockchains), some of them will be tied to real-world objects or experiences.

Different stredium drops:

* Stredium Metaverse (LAND): metaverse land, plots.
* Champions (CHAMP): digital twin, unique real-world objects.
* Stadium (STA): CryptoStadium virtual seating club, events.
* Most Valuable Player (MVP): man of the match awards.
* Streaming (STR): CryptoStreaming, live content.
* Avatars (AVATAR): Legendary avatars.
* Stredium (STREDIUM): governance, rewards token.

 Choose what should be our priority.
author: 0x61A1EE4CD25659CF87B7bd2E6f5669CD667498c9
